name: Bluebird
description:
Bluebird is a story-based minimalist 2d platformer-runner made in a little less than a week for Resist Jam 2017. The game follows the story of a young boy who wanted to become a bird all his life, and his interactions with people who didn't take kindly to his dream. One day, while he's slacking off at work, something happens...

Controls:
First part: Space to flap wings.
Second part: A and D to run left or right, W to vault over obstacles, S to slide (useful against water coolers!).

Please report any bugs you find and stay tuned for the full release of the game!
